statements: SELECT pixel_id, land_cover_type, change_date, change_reason FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis;
SELECT land_cover_type, pixel_id, change_date FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis;
SELECT change_reason, land_cover_type, pixel_id FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis WHERE change_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT pixel_id, change_reason FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis WHERE land_cover_type='Forest';
SELECT * FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest' ORDER BY change_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT pixel_id, change_date FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis WHERE change_reason LIKE '%Urbanization%'
SELECT DISTINCT land_cover_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis GROUP BY land_cover_type ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT pixel_id, land_cover_type, change_date, change_reason FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(pixel_id) AS avg_pixel_id, MAX(pixel_id) AS max_pixel_id FROM LandCoverChangeAnalysis WHERE land_cover_type = 'Water'
SELECT * FROM land_cover_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, land_type FROM land_cover_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, timestamp, location, land_type FROM land_cover_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_change WHERE previous_land_type = 'forest' AND updated_land_type = 'crop';
SELECT location, previous_land_type, updated_land_type FROM land_cover_change WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM land_cover_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, land_type FROM land_cover_data WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, location, land_type FROM land_cover_data WHERE land_type = 'Forest' OR land_type = 'River' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_change WHERE previous_land_type = 'Grassland' AND updated_land_type = 'Urban' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, location, previous_land_type, updated_land_type FROM land_cover_change WHERE location = 'London' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM LandCoverData;
SELECT id, location, land_cover_type FROM LandCoverData WHERE land_cover_percentage > 50;
SELECT location, land_cover_type, land_cover_percentage FROM LandCoverData ORDER BY land_cover_percentage DESC;
SELECT change_id, change_type FROM LandCoverChanges WHERE change_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT data_id, location, sensor_type, captured_date FROM RemoteSensingData WHERE captured_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT * FROM LandCoverData WHERE land_cover_percentage >= 0.5 ORDER BY location ASC, id DESC;
SELECT location, land_cover_type, land_cover_percentage FROM LandCoverData WHERE land_cover_type='Forest' ORDER BY land_cover_percentage DESC;
SELECT location, change_type, change_date FROM LandCoverChanges WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY change_date ASC, change_id DESC;
SELECT location, sensor_type, captured_date FROM RemoteSensingData ORDER BY captured_date DESC, data_id DESC;

SELECT L.location, L.land_cover_type, R.sensor_type FROM LandCoverData L JOIN RemoteSensingData R ON L.location = R.location WHERE R.sensor_type='Satellite' ORDER BY L.location ASC,R.sensor_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_data;
SELECT id, area_name, land_cover_type FROM land_cover_data ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT category_name FROM land_cover_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT area_name, change_type, change_date FROM land_cover_data WHERE change_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM land_cover_data;
SELECT area_name FROM land_cover_data ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT category_name, change_percentage FROM land_cover_categories JOIN temporal_change ON land_cover_categories.category_id = temporal_change.land_cover_id;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT area_name, land_cover_type, change_type, change_date FROM land_cover_data WHERE area_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_analysis;
SELECT image_id, timestamp, location FROM land_cover_analysis WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest';
SELECT category_name FROM land_cover_categories ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT image_id, resolution FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT result_id, change_percentage FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY change_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_analysis WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest';
SELECT image_id, timestamp, location FROM land_cover_analysis WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name FROM land_cover_categories WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT image_id, image_path, acquisition_date FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution > 0.5 ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT result_id, analysis_date, change_percentage FROM analysis_results WHERE change_percentage BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
